name: Flappy Red (PinguCraft)
description:
This game is Flappy Bird but in better, with many Achievements and a shop.

Controls

The controls are very easy to learn. The only thing that you need to know is that you can jump with every button that you have.

Shop

That you can pay another color in the shop, you need to have a trophy for the Achievements. Than you can pay a color and drag and drop it to a place. The max. count of Places is 8 and the max. count of seconds per color is 300 Seconds.

But now have a good time with this game.
